cards.rules_text:
When Madeline enters, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
[i]Reach the Summit[/i] — At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, put two +1/+1 counters on Madeline.

Whenever one or more nontoken creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 black Bird creature token with flying.
At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, target creature you control connives.

Whenever Ghiaccio enters or attacks, tap up to one target creature and put three stun counters on it.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard.
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature is a copy of the exiled card, except it has its original name.

cards.rules_text:

{2}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Create a Blood token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

cards.rules_text: Mill three cards. An opponent chooses one card from among them to cost 1 life, another to cost 2 life, and a third to cost 3 life. You may put any number of those cards into your hand by paying the associated life cost.

Menace

Whenever Orochimaru deals combat damage to a player, draw two cards, then discard two cards.
You may activate Orochimaru's ninjutsu ability from your graveyard.

Whenever you commit a crime, an opponent chooses one they haven't chosen yet. This ability triggers only once each turn.
• That opponent sacrifices two creatures.
• That opponent discards two cards.
• That opponent loses 4 life.

Draft Red face up. Turn it face down at the end of the draft round.
